title: Toyota using made-for-Tesla Panasonic batteries for China hybrids -Nikkei
text:
Toyota using made-for-Tesla Panasonic batteries for China hybrids -Nikkei

Stock Markets 45 minutes ago (Sep 13, 2019 01:26)

TOKYO (Reuters) - Toyota Motor Corp has started using batteries that Panasonic Corp designed for Tesla Inc in some of its plug-in hybrids sold in China, the business daily reported on Friday. Toyota is using Panasonic's cylindrical batteries in its new Corolla and Levin plug-in hybrid sedans launched in China this year, the Nikkei said, without citing sources. Toyota is believed to have ordered about 50,000 of the batteries, the paper said. A Panasonic spokeswoman said the company was not in a position to comment as a supplier, while Toyota declined to comment.

Toyota using made-for-Tesla Panasonic batteries for China hybrids -Nikkei
description: Toyota using made-for-Tesla Panasonic batteries for China hybrids -Nikkei
